title: go.talks/pkg/socket: wrong message with non-main package
body:
for example (http://play.golang.org/p/HBXfKtDkyk):

package nomain

import "fmt"

func main() {
	fmt.Println("hello, world")
}

On Win7, return this message:
Program exited: exec: "C:\\Users\\chai\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\compile6.exe":
GetFileAttributesEx C:\Users\chai\AppData\Local\Temp\compile6.exe: The system cannot
find the file specified.
